def_cn: （说话）认真地,郑重其事地
def_en: If you say something earnestly, you say it very seriously, often because you believe that it is important or you are trying to persuade someone else to believe it.

def_cn: （做事）认真地，全心全意地
def_en: If you do something earnestly, you do it in a thorough and serious way, intending to succeed.
If you earnestly hope or wish for something, you hope or wish strongly and sincerely for it.
